title: (Rito Spaghetti Codeâ„¢ for LoL 6.1) [Urgent] Game Crashes Everywhere (air client)
body: My game crashes every time I try to go into any options menu, queue, champion info, masteries, etc. Pretty much anything that has a menu. It makes LoL unplayable. Rito Spaghetti Code™ strikes again.

replies.body: I even repaired my client, still nothing

Hey guys,

I would highly suggest trying to repair your client - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6

And if you still see issues send a ticket to player support.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=eld8eE0X,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-01-15T00:31:18.423+0000)
>
> Hey guys,
> 
> I would highly suggest trying to repair your client - https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6
> 
> And if you still see issues send a ticket to player support.

I even reinstalled, still broken. Fix your sh!t riot.
Hi Maraudaur, I repaired the game and it still crashes. How can I send a ticket to player support?
